data.text: @Dakeb_MCFC Forgot  where  you  come  from   mr  .  Champers  same  price  as  the  fine   ironic  .most  working  guy  who  put  you  there  would  struggle  to  pay  that.greedy  f#*#$££ .
@Lucky13RP @Dakeb_MCFC It was late because it wasn't his car but a loan car. Took time to establish who was driving.
@Dakeb_MCFC @Andreayates44 Always thought he was overrated as a football player. Bit bored with the whole brand Beckham thing as well. They come across as really false!!!
@Dakeb_MCFC So it you were caught you wouldn't use a technicality, everyone knows the papers have to be with you within 14 days. Celebrate once the dates gone passed if your worried been caught.
@paulmufc05 @Dakeb_MCFC It was bullshit.  The photographer apparently was in a Fiesta 🤣🤣🤣
@Jackabilly Crazy he prefers to sacrifice his reputation for a few £££ and three points.
@wayneofwolves Yep criminals sometimes get away with crimes
@levetsmcfc @MoDualeh @Braddersole @paulmufc05 Correct
@MoDualeh @Dakeb_MCFC @Braddersole @paulmufc05 That I wholeheartedly agree with.  He spent all that money to ensure he escaped the 3 points.
@levetsmcfc @Dakeb_MCFC @Braddersole @paulmufc05 You're right. I also said it wasn't a crime at first but i was wrong. It's a question of Morality for Beckham.

@MoDualeh @Dakeb_MCFC @Braddersole @paulmufc05 You can ‘get off’ with ANY crime on a technicality if the correct procedure is not followed.  In this case the NIP arrived late, seems ridiculous, but the correct procedure wasn’t followed. I was just answering those saying speeding is not a criminal offence, but Civil #criminal
@levetsmcfc @Dakeb_MCFC @Braddersole @paulmufc05 You're right but motoring works different because there are technicalities involved that can get you off scott free like what happened here.
@MoDualeh @Dakeb_MCFC @Braddersole @paulmufc05 It is a ‘non recordable’ crime.  Nevertheless it is a crime.  Civil proceedings are not prosecuted by the Police.

@Braddersole @MoDualeh @Dakeb_MCFC @paulmufc05 It is indeed a CRIMINAL OFFENCE. You are prosecuted by the Police (hence criminal), however you do not receive a blemish on your record as it is a non recordable (Minor) offence.  However, Driving under the influence (Alcohol or Drugs) is a recordable (Major) offence.  Source gmp
@Dakeb_MCFC Says alot about a man that he would rather spend thousands on lawyers than admit he was wrong and accept a few points on his licence.
@sarsarz85 @Andrewh62626071 @Dakeb_MCFC This holds for any legal case, papers have a set time they need to be served in.
@Dakeb_MCFC He’s so arrogant he won’t care about bad press
@bearingwest @Andrewh62626071 @Dakeb_MCFC Can’t afford petrol let alone a car or a lawyer
@SaMiCla68 Was it worth all the bad press he's got?

@Lucky13RP My first anger is directed towards the perpetrator of the crime because going 50% over the speed limit isn't accidental and shows a disrespect for other road users. Everyone else failed to do their job properly.
@leebavfc @Dakeb_MCFC Ha ha I just don’t speed 🤥
@debbieball3 @Dakeb_MCFC You can 😉
@labourpartyliam @Sean_Millea @Dakeb_MCFC Your full of shit
@Dont_rushh @paulmufc05 Speeding is a criminal offence if found guilty in a court.
@Dakeb_MCFC @paulmufc05 “A crime” he’s speeding it’s a traffic violation at best relax nonce everyone in the world speeds if you don’t at least a little you shouldn’t be on the roads
@Dakeb_MCFC Would’ve had so much more respect for him if he’d not gone for the loophole. Just because he could, doesn’t mean he should. What a role model......🙄
@Dakeb_MCFC Them that have!!
@SerbYid @Dakeb_MCFC Pathetic ain’t it, like the geezer bangin on about it has never broke a speed limit in his life
@bluemanc100 I'd notice
@Rocket_Sauce13 You would hope the driver would attempt to stop.
@Dakeb_MCFC Not intentionally I guess...
@Dakeb_MCFC Ok, so we’re adding in slamming on the brakes now, but that wasn’t in your original tweet...
@Dakeb_MCFC He is a  waste of time  thinks   he is god
@Rocket_Sauce13 Your stopping distance doubles. If you slam your brakes on at 40mph and you stop just in time, at 60mph you strike the potential pedestrian at 40mph.
@Dakeb_MCFC I bet you’re fun at a party 🎉🙄
@cockney_yid There is a big difference between rules and crimes.
@Dakeb_MCFC Rules/laws, same thing, just splitting hairs, as I said blaming Beckham is just barking up the wrong tree
@Dakeb_MCFC Carry on with this it’s outrageous!
@cockney_yid Beckham didn't break the rules, he committed a crime and got away with it purely due to the incompetence of the agencies who are supposed to be enforcing the laws.
@jamesrickards5 @commonxdreads People with integrity wouldn't commit the crime in the first place but if they had, they would pay the fine. Don't judge everyone by your low standards.

@Dakeb_MCFC Rules are rules, Beckham broke the rules & got brought to court, the police never followed the rules correctly & case gets thrown out, so the blame lies with the police/speed partnerships, not Beckham.
@jamesrickards5 @commonxdreads He committed a crime and got away with it. He might be legally entitled to, but it's far from justice.
@commonxdreads He obviously isn't happy to pay the fine or he wouldn't have employed a lawyer to exploit this technicality. Nothing to do with the govt.
@Dakeb_MCFC Just confirms if you've got the money you'll get away with it
@Dakeb_MCFC This is the scumbag who’s pathetically, desperately after a knighthood. Nice guy my arse. We’ve all been caught speeding, you take the consequences and get on with life.

@SagerHimme The braking distance at 60mph is double that at 40mph. If you could just about stop at 40 mph, no injury. If you were doing 60mph in the same braking distance you will strike the pedestrian at 40mph.
@DJacksonGolf @Dakeb_MCFC Are you actually reading what I type?  Any lawyer will know this and as I said a quick google will tell you about deadlines.
@Dakeb_MCFC @bluemanc100 https://t.co/Bax2jCUVOu
@bluemanc100 I've never had a speeding ticket. I would never do 59 in a 40.
@Dakeb_MCFC @jane1061 This,  from a person who wants to become a knight of the realm #Beckham
@Dakeb_MCFC 40mph will still kill a pedestrian. I'm just saying
@Dakeb_MCFC So you wouldn’t exploit a loophole... or you wouldn’t speed? I’ve done 2 speed awareness courses myself for very minor infringements so I can’t lecture anybody.. you??
@Braddersole @MoDualeh @levetsmcfc @paulmufc05 Wrong again.

@seanpurcellart @Dakeb_MCFC When last have you sat in a court? Most people can’t even afford legal counsel and are representing themselves.
🙄
@Dakeb_MCFC @paulmufc05 We’re hating because Mr and Mrs Joe Public aren’t afforded such leniency.
@Dakeb_MCFC Well that's definitely goodbye knighthood!!! Rightly so.
@Stuartftm1983 @Dakeb_MCFC Anyone who says different is full of shit
@MoDualeh @Dakeb_MCFC @levetsmcfc @paulmufc05 Only a crime if drunk driving or dangerous driving!

@Dakeb_MCFC @Braddersole @levetsmcfc @paulmufc05 A killer leaving DNA in a crime scene does not get off on a technicality if forensics posted the samples too late. So speeding is not a crime unless it becomes dangerous driving or similar.

@Dakeb_MCFC @Braddersole @levetsmcfc @paulmufc05 If Beckham was found guilty (by plea or by court), it would be a criminal conviction but does not go on criminal record. Same thing for a seat belt. Technicalities such as fines or points exist for these. It's 50 50 in the eyes of the law.
@Dakeb_MCFC @UNICEF @UNICEF_uk https://t.co/JKRhL6aLCo
@Braddersole @MoDualeh @levetsmcfc @paulmufc05 You're wrong too
@Dakeb_MCFC @MoDualeh @levetsmcfc @paulmufc05 He's not, it's a civil offence!

@mcDarke @Dakeb_MCFC Be pissed off or do something about. I've followed Mr Loophole examples and successfully defended myself twice in court for alleged driving offences. So you don't need money, just need to be smart. Saying that if u need my assistance in the future I will charge u!
@Dakeb_MCFC You're a Disgrace!!!!

@kfdonovan @Dakeb_MCFC That is not the point.....lots of us have gone faster than we should have but when we get caught bang to rights we don’t have an option of getting in Mr Loop hole, he got caught and should have just taken responsibility....that’s what has pissed me off.
@Dakeb_MCFC @mcDarke Last time I checked there are no pedestrians on the A40! And youve never sped over the speed limit no?!

@AIM_messiah @Dakeb_MCFC @LauraLo23859821 Yep. Hopefully stop the cash cow that car drivers have become.  I think the 14 days is so you have a fair chance to remember who was driving your car that day.
@seanpurcellart @Dakeb_MCFC Exactly!
@Common_Opinion @Dakeb_MCFC "That fact he killed no one means no wrongdoing" what a load of nonsense. I suppose driving drunk is fine then as long as you don't hit anybody.
@Dakeb_MCFC Its a complete joke,I like becks ,but he should have got it on the chin like everyone else, this is out of line.

@TheDaveCalaz @levetsmcfc @Dakeb_MCFC @paulmufc05 I haven’t suggested that. If you disagree with a law you can campaign all you like. But if you break it then it’s on you. And if you can’t take the consequences, then no one is forced to stay.
@devilsplaylist @bill_football @Dakeb_MCFC I totally agree. I’m just saying that to really reduce fatalities on our roads we need to drop limits to 20 not 40 or 30.
@Dakeb_MCFC 😂😂😂 the club with no history are upset. Nice one David Beckham.

@worksopdanic @levetsmcfc @Dakeb_MCFC @paulmufc05 You have to abide by laws of course. But to say "like it or leave" is suggesting that the law is correct always. Which, as history has shown, isn't always the case.

@Andrewh62626071 @Dakeb_MCFC You don't need the most expensive lawyers, the cheapest lawyer you can find would find this loophole straight away. If papers are served late then the prosecution have lost. A quick google can tell you all this so in theory you could get out of it without even paying a lawyer.
@DJacksonGolf @Dakeb_MCFC No the Law is the same for everyone, a quick google can tell you about it and even the cheapest lawyer would know about it.

@AIM_messiah @Dakeb_MCFC @LauraLo23859821 Papers have to be sent and delivered in a certain time frame I think it’s 14 days from the date of the incident.  Pending any reasonable delay such as a mail strike.
@LauraLo23859821 @Dakeb_MCFC Still remember that penalty vs Argentina! Stuff of legend
@Dakeb_MCFC I bet u been nicked for speeding ain't ya .....I detect jelousy
@Dakeb_MCFC Calling him a disgrace is just ridiculous. Yeah, this man is so greedy...how much did he give to children's charities agin🤔

@TheDaveCalaz @levetsmcfc @Dakeb_MCFC @paulmufc05 Go to any country & you have to abide by the laws. They govern what you can and can’t do. They can be strict but usually for good reason. Those that govern have to adopt certain practices. If they make a mistake you’re entitled to object, just as Beckham has.
@Dakeb_MCFC Stop crying hypocrite and get to a city match . The stadium needs you .
@DJacksonGolf @Dakeb_MCFC It's actually the same rule for everyone.
@Stuartftm1983 @Dakeb_MCFC If authorities are incompetent and can’t do the job given to him that’s not his fault.
@devilsplaylist @officialwrighty @Dakeb_MCFC @MrHenryGee And much the same as he needs to do that those serving papers to him need to make note of the dates by which they must (by law) be served.

@bearingwest @Dakeb_MCFC But we all can't afford Mr loophole to find that out for is. Things lie this really annoy me beckham has broken the law again but again he doesn't want to take responsibility for his actions he's too important for that
@LauraLo23859821 @ThatBarton @Dakeb_MCFC But it does. He used a law to get out of paying the fine. You could do the exact same
@Dakeb_MCFC Wow,  big exaggeration here..he didn't hit or kill anyone..he was just speeding. Also you can kill someone at 40mph.
@Andrewh62626071 @Dakeb_MCFC Law works both ways. Law says ticket must arrive in 14 days. It arrived in 15. He didnt write the law
@Andrewh62626071 @Dakeb_MCFC To be fair the technicality is part of Law, it matters not if you have money or not anyone would win if they presented it.
@MoDualeh @levetsmcfc @paulmufc05 You're wrong
@labourpartyliam @Sean_Millea @Dakeb_MCFC Cut the crap, you would have done the same and if you say otherwise, your full of shit
@Dakeb_MCFC Absolutely disgusting, i have lost any respect for him.  If you do the crime do the time
@abc_bridgewater @LauraLo23859821 @Dakeb_MCFC I don't disagree with what he's done, I disagree with the law

@jamesrickards5 @Dakeb_MCFC I've had a speeding ticket. My first thought wasn't "have they sent it within 14 days?" No. It was "Oh shit, better pay my dues". Ordinary working folk should mad as shit at this. Money talks!
@officialwrighty @Dakeb_MCFC @MrHenryGee He doesn't need to, he just needs to read those pesky little speed limit signs.
@bill_football @Dakeb_MCFC @tara__sparkles Speed limits aren't advisory they are mandatory. And for good reason.
@LauraLo23859821 @Dakeb_MCFC This has nothing to do with Beckham. Beckham didn’t crash the car or hit anyone. Deal with the parties involved in your problem.
@Dakeb_MCFC I do agree as a high profile good guy image celeb  he should have took it. But we'd all try to avoid points if we could.

@Dakeb_MCFC @LauraLo23859821 He didn’t hide behind anything- he was freed by the law. Use a good lawyer for your issues and u won’t have reasons to be bitter. Beckham’s lawyer is excellent but neither of them wrote the law and its applied to ppl equally. It’s a defended’s job to arrange defence.
@Dakeb_MCFC would have killed a pedestrian at 40mph. Stop the hating
@salmon1620 @Dakeb_MCFC @HMRCgovuk Very true Sean,the country is fucked and the government r bent as fuck.ond rule for them and one for us #GETFUCKED

@Dakeb_MCFC But no one was hurt and the law cleared him. The law is reasoning free from emotion. Hypotheticals don’t play a part in law - only facts do and that’s what u would like for yourself if you ever found yourself in court
@Dakeb_MCFC The envy on here is laughable, get over yourselves, he does more for charity and added more to society than all u lot slagging him off
@worksopdanic @levetsmcfc @Dakeb_MCFC @paulmufc05 I've just heard about this so I'm not sure what's gone on... However "that's the law, like it or leave" is really terrible advice.

@SeeMeGB @Cityzen56 @Dakeb_MCFC What’s to say Bentley haven’t lied about when the letter really arrived to save one of their highest regarded customers. Beckham has shown by this that he is willing to pay money and use loopholes to get out what is a pocket money fine in comparison to what he earns

@paulmufc05 @levetsmcfc @Dakeb_MCFC if you you don't know what it is then why you commenting on it  he admitted his guilt he just not being charged. its like me punching you in the face, admitting i punched you, but the judge let me off because i wasn't aiming for your face but the fly on your face.
@Dakeb_MCFC Absolutely agree ..white rich privilege in a nut shell
@levetsmcfc @paulmufc05 @Dakeb_MCFC Speeding is not a criminal offence.
@levetsmcfc @Dakeb_MCFC I don't know what this technicality is but there's obviously some fault gone on therefore he's innocent
@levetsmcfc @Dakeb_MCFC So ur calling him out now for running away from a pack of scum chasing him down like he's an animal, classy
@Dakeb_MCFC No knighthood for him then! Where is he domiciled for Tax?

@Dakeb_MCFC If you've got money you don't need to abide by societies laws. I'm sure Mr loophole lawyer is really proud of himself for getting Beckham off for the 2nd time. Law obviously doesnt apply Beckham he's too rich for it.

@Dakeb_MCFC Just because he was speeding does not mean he was not in control when the hypothetical pedestrian walked onto the road without looking! Everyone speeds and anyone that says they don’t is 🤥! If I could afford a lawyer to get me off I would do the same!

@Dakeb_MCFC @tara__sparkles It was on the A40 flyover, it’s like saying going 70 on a motorway is too fast. It’s perfectly safe to do 60 on the west way.  I know the speed limit says different. Just saying it’s perfectly safe to do so.
@LewisKMarshall @Dakeb_MCFC Like it 👍
@Dakeb_MCFC @MrHenryGee I doubt Beckham has been keeping up with the local Paddington Council Heighway divisions signage planning to be honest.
@Dakeb_MCFC By that logic, neither has he. It’s so easy to shame someone, doubt it’d be the same if it was Sergio. #bitter (but you put Hudds to stay up this season, so fair play my g)
@Dakeb_MCFC Yeah but he's Becks #lovebecks #mufc
@LewisKMarshall I've been driving 39 years and never had a ticket
@Dakeb_MCFC @LauraLo23859821 Still some player though https://t.co/eto5eO6WS8
@tara__sparkles And at 60 there won't be much left of you
@jamesrickards5 No I wouldn't do 59 in a 40
@Dakeb_MCFC Shut up. We’re all the victim in theory. No one died. Don’t act like you never speed.

@Dakeb_MCFC Blame that loophole lawyer bloke mainly
 Beckham culpable fo show but that lawyer and others like him ... disgrace!!!
@Dakeb_MCFC Isn't this the second time he's escaped punishment for speeding, I recall him claiming he was escaping paparazzi the last time he was caught.
@levetsmcfc @Dakeb_MCFC @paulmufc05 Law is the law. Don’t like it go to another country. It’s as simple as that.
@Dakeb_MCFC #DavidBeckham #cunt
@paulmufc05 @Dakeb_MCFC He admits he was doing 49mph.  That is committing a crime.  He’s just fortunate he got away with it again.
@Dakeb_MCFC @paulmufc05 And not for the first time.  Remember him speeding because the paparazzi were tail gating him... in Carrington.
@MrHenryGee @Dakeb_MCFC What if he'd crashed into a car that had a kid in it ?
@Dakeb_MCFC What a complete twat.
@LauraLo23859821 @Dakeb_MCFC Did you tell your brother he shouldn't speed?
@Dakeb_MCFC Hopefully the twat #Beckham will never get a knighthood. EVER!
@Dakeb_MCFC You could be killed at 45mph as well. Not saying what he did was right, but while the percentage of death increases the higher the speed, 40mph isn't exactly guaranteed survival speed...
@Dakeb_MCFC If you were hit at 40mph you would have an 80% chance of it killing you in any case.  Only at 20mph do those statistics drop dramatically..
@Dakeb_MCFC Technically not a crime then if he got off is it and at best it's 1 of those shitty 1s that really shuddnt exist in the 1st place
@paulmufc05 We're hating because he has used a technicality to get away with a crime

@Dakeb_MCFC But there was a technical issue so therefore he shuddnt be done, u lot who jumping on the band wagon are just hating coz of who he is for some reason it's cool to not like a national treasure who shud have been knighted a decade ago
@Dakeb_MCFC Disgusting, pretentious twat!!
@MrHenryGee The authorities have to give plenty of warning of changes to the speed limit.
@LauraLo23859821 Absolutely, then hiding behind a technicality is pure greedy cowardice

@Dakeb_MCFC No pedestrians where he did it on an overpass/flyover. It was 60 for years and they just did it without telling anyone. Still illegal of course but it’s not a b-road outside a primary school.
@Cityzen56 @Dakeb_MCFC Not really. Same loophole for anyone...
@Dakeb_MCFC The Beckham's both a pair of pretentious tossers , only together because they are too greedy to split from their loveless marriage
